name: UserId
responsibilities: Act as a unique identifier for the program's users.

name: ContactInfo
responsibilities: Store an email and telephone number (both optional).

name: UserData
responsibilities: Store a user's name and contact information.

name: State
responsibilities: Represent a user's state in the program.
Determine the next state and the response message to a received one.

name: UserSession
responsibilities: Represent the session of a user in the bot.
Store the information of a program's user (id, current state and additional data).

name: Invitation
responsibilities: Represent an invitation into the platform.
Store the code of the invitation.
Handle the event of being validated.

name: InvitationManager
responsibilities: Encapsulate the handling of the program's invitations.

name: SessionManager
responsibilities: Encapsulate the handling of the program's user sessions.

name: Message
responsibilities: Represent a message received from a messaging platform.
Store the message's text and the id of the user who sent it.

name: MessageManager
responsibilities: Process a received message and determine the response.

name: IMessageSender
responsibilities: Send messages via a messaging platform.

name: IMessageReceiver
responsibilities: Receive messages via a messaging platform.

name: MessagingPlatform
responsibilities: Represent a messaging platform, through which messages can be sent and received.

name: IFromInput
responsibilities: Represent a data piece which can be given by the user.
Convert the input into that data piece, process which could result in an error or an interrupt signal.

name: FormState
responsibilities: Represent a complex form-like set of data through which certain forms of data can be received from user input easily.
Store an amount of data pieces that are given by user input little by little.

name: Unit
responsibilities: Represent a measurement unit, with which a certain amount of material can be indicated.
Store the unit's name and abbreviation.
Convert units from the same measure.

name: Measure
responsibilities: Represent a measure, with which certain materials can be measured.
Store the measure's name and units.

name: Habilitation
responsibilities: Represent an habilitation of an entrepreneur, with which they gain access to certain materials.

name: Requirement
responsibilities: Represent a requirement to manipulate certain materials.
Check whether an habilitation meets the requirement or not.
Check whether a certain set of habilitations meet a certain set of requirements.

name: MaterialCategory
responsibilities: Represent a category of materials.

name: Material
responsibilities: Represent a material which can be sold by companies and purchased by entrepreneurs.
Store the material's name, requirements, category, and measure.

name: Amount
responsibilities: Represent an amount of material.
Store the numeric value and the unit of the amount of material.

name: Currency
responsibilities: Represent a currency, with which transactions can be made.
Store the currency's name and symbol.

name: Price
responsibilities: Represent the price of a material.
Store the price's numeric value, currency and unit.

name: Location
responsibilities: Represent a location in the world.
Calculate the distance between two locations.

name: MaterialPublication
responsibilities: Represent a material publication.
Store the publication's material, stock, price and pick-up location.

name: MoneyQuantity
responsibilities: Represent an amount of money.
Store its numeric value and currency.

name: MaterialSalesLine
responsibilities: Represent a single material sale.
Store the sale's material, amount, price, moment, and income.

name: SentMaterialReport
responsibilities: Represent a report of several material sales.

name: IPublisher
responsibilities: Publish materials into the platform.

name: ISentMaterialReportCreator
responsibilities: Create reports of sent materials.

name: Company
responsibilities: Represent a company.
Store the company's name, contact information, heading and representants.

name: IInputHandler
responsibilities: Process input messages and alter the program's state accordingly.

name: IInputProcessor
responsibilities: Process input messages and return an object from them.

name: FormProcessor
responsibilities: Process several input messages in a form-like manner, and generate an object with that input.
